page.title: 01INTRODUCTION.
page.content: This area is mostly level fields and patches of higher land with one village,North Newton.The population consists of approximately 560 people. The village of North Newton contains one store and post office, selling all the ordinary things, and some quite unusual things like leather laces, Reckits blue,bottle teats,moth balls, sealing wax,collar studs and pop coins.We also get a mobile fishmonger,ice cream man,baker and butcher.We have a Primary school and two hair dressers.There is a village hall in which we have discos,concerts, bingos,whist drives and youth club. The village has about 11 hamlets around it.A canal and a motorway go through this area.We have a bus service every Wednesday.We have one church, one pub and two garages.
